players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "I trust Charlie's investigation. Diana is mafioso, let's vote her out."
Diana: "Charlie, you're lying to save yourself. I think you're the mafioso trying to frame me—vote for him instead!"
You: "Diana, if you're innocent, why not claim detective? Charlie's claim is specific and risky for mafioso to fake. I'm voting Diana."
Charlie: "Diana, you're the only one without a claim. If you were detective, you'd have said so. Your deflection confirms my investigation."
Diana: "Charlie, you're desperate to shift blame. If you're really the detective, prove it by investigating Bob next. I'm innocent—vote him out!"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Bob: "I trust Charlie's investigation. Diana is mafioso, let's vote her out."
Diana: "Charlie, you're lying to save yourself. I think you're the mafioso trying to frame me—vote for him instead!"
Bob: "Diana, if you're innocent, why not claim detective? Charlie's claim is specific and risky for mafioso to fake. I'm voting Diana."
You: "Diana, you're the only one without a claim. If you were detective, you'd have said so. Your deflection confirms my investigation."
Diana: "Charlie, you're desperate to shift blame. If you're really the detective, prove it by investigating Bob next. I'm innocent—vote him out!"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Bob: "I trust Charlie's investigation. Diana is mafioso, let's vote her out."
You: "Charlie, you're lying to save yourself. I think you're the mafioso trying to frame me—vote for him instead!"
Bob: "Diana, if you're innocent, why not claim detective? Charlie's claim is specific and risky for mafioso to fake. I'm voting Diana."
Charlie: "Diana, you're the only one without a claim. If you were detective, you'd have said so. Your deflection confirms my investigation."
You: "Charlie, you're desperate to shift blame. If you're really the detective, prove it by investigating Bob next. I'm innocent—vote him out!"
